item.title: [COLOR orange][B][+]BUSCAR EN: [/B] [/COLOR][COLOR white] GranTorrent [/COLOR] [COLOR gold] Castellano[/COLOR]

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Pelicula:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat:
<SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR orange][B] [makelist2.param3][/B][/COLOR] Calidad:[makelist.param2] Tama√±o:[makelist.param3] </title>
<name>select</name> <expres><![CDATA[#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Choose a movie', ['Torrenter', 'Recomendado', 'Quasar']) channels = ['plugin://plugin.video.torrenter/?action=playSTRM&url=[makelist.param4]', 'plugin://plugin.video.quasar/play?uri=[makelist.param4]', 'plugin://plugin.video.quasar/play?uri=[makelist.param4]'] return channels[ret]
$doregex[select] [makelist2.param2]
]]>

item.title: [COLOR orange][B][+] BUSCAR [/B] || [/COLOR][COLOR white] SkyTorrents [/COLOR] [COLOR gold] Multi Idioma[/COLOR]

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Torrent de Pelicula:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

item.title: [COLOR orange][B][+]Novedades [/B] [/COLOR][COLOR white] Agregadas Recientemente [/COLOR] [COLOR gold] Castellano[/COLOR]

regex.name: reproductor
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un reproductor: ', ['Quasar', 'Torrentin', 'Torrenter', 'kmediatorrent']) lists = ['plugin://plugin.video.quasar/play?uri=http://www.mejortorrent.com[makelist.param2]','plugin://plugin.video.torrentin/?uri=http://www.mejortorrent.com[makelist.param2]','plugin://plugin.video.torrenter/?action=playSTRM&url=http://www.mejortorrent.com[makelist.param2]','plugin://plugin.video.kmediatorrent/play/http://www.mejortorrent.com[makelist.param2]'] return lists[ret]
